div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 17:55 pm CDT

div.span: A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. South southeast wind 8 to 10 mph.
A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly between 7am and 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 78. South wind 13 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 63. South wind around 11 mph.

h3.a: Tigers surface in top 10 in regional SeaPerch competition

div.h4: WPS students build and pilot an underwater rover in regional competition
div.p: Wewoka High School students Alexis Porter, Tristian Thompson, Sara Beck, Thomas Hammond and Kennedy Westmoreland represented the Tigers SaturdayÂ Jan. 25, 2020, at the regional SeaPerchÂ competition at Jenks Trojan Aquatic Center to place 9th overall.

a.aria-label: Read more about Tigers surface in top 10 in regional SeaPerch competition

h3.a: WPS to Host 36th Annual Science Fair in Honor of Pam Morgan

a.aria-label: Read more about WPS to Host 36th Annual Science Fair in Honor of Pam Morgan

h3.a: Tigers say "no" to vaping, "yes" to health

div.h4: Wewoka High School hosts anti-vaping rally Wednesday
div.p: WHS hosted an anti-vaping rally Wednesday after lunch in the auditorium. Special Agent Erik Smoot and Jon Greenwood, C.P.S. spoke to students about the costs of vaping.

a.aria-label: Read more about Tigers say "no" to vaping, "yes" to health

h3.a: 2020 Wewoka Tigers Yearbooks on sale now!

div.h4: Capture the spirit of 2020 by pre-ordering yours today!
div.p: Yearbooks may be pre-ordered for $20 until Jan. 31. Regular pricing and ordering will begin Feb. 1. Please see Mr. BorstÂ or a member of yearbook staff for more details or to place your order.

a.aria-label: Read more about 2020 Wewoka Tigers Yearbooks on sale now!

h3.a: Season's Greetings from Wewoka Public Schools!

div.h4: All schools will be closed for Christmas holiday Monday, Dec. 23 until Tuesday, Jan. 7
div.p: Have a safe and happy holiday, students!

a.aria-label: Read more about Season's Greetings from Wewoka Public Schools!

h3.a: Wewoka Students take to the Stage in Hilarious Robinson Crusoe Spoof!

div.h4: WPS partners with Missoula Troup to perform Robinson Crusoe
div.p: Students from all grade levels were invited to audition for Robinson Crusoe.

a.aria-label: Read more about Wewoka Students take to the Stage in Hilarious Robinson Crusoe Spoof!

h3.a: WPS Juniors and Seniors get 'Reality Check' - What's life like on the other side of graduation?

div.h4: Security State Bank partners with Wewoka Public Schools to host event educating grads about life
div.p:
Through the sponsorship of Security State Bank, Wewoka High School is excited to announce a new annual event
for our junior and senior students and our great community.
Â
Â
On December 19 th , from 9:00 a.m. to noon, you will get a taste of what life is like on the . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about WPS Juniors and Seniors get 'Reality Check' - What's life like on the other side of graduation?

h3.a: Wewoka Public Schools Dedicated to Health and Wellness

div.h4: WPS sponsors "Walk to School" program promoting healthy habits and fitness
div.p: Students, teachers and staff took a walk this October to raise awareness about ways our community can live happier, healthier lifestyles.

a.aria-label: Read more about Wewoka Public Schools Dedicated to Health and Wellness
